description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the Microsoft Local Security Authority (LSA) Server information disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-38118), it is essential to apply the relevant updates depending on your current Windows version:

1. Identify your Windows version and build number.
2. Download the appropriate update package from the links provided below.
3. Install the update and restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- For Windows 11 Version 24H2, install KB5041571.
- For Windows 11 Version 23H2, install KB5041585.
- For Windows 10, install KB5041782 (x64/32-bit).
- Ensure that your system's build number corresponds with the update.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.

**Update Packages**:
- [KB5041782](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041782)
- [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
- [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)
- [KB5041592](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041592)
- [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571)
